home.paragraph: a passionate about programming and photography.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: With more than 3 years of experience in the Web Development field, I stand out for my capacity for continuous learning and my efficiency in solving challenges in every project I undertake.

services.title: Services
services.description: I develop modern, scalable web applications with a focus on quality and performance.

design.title: Web Design
design.description: Beautiful and elegant designs with interactive interfaces that are intuitive, effective and pleasant to use for the user.

development.title: Development
development.description: Custom web development tailored to your specifications, designed to deliver a flawless user experience.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Development of websites that perfectly adapt to any device, providing an optimal user experience at all times.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Technologies I've used in various projects throughout my career

achievements.landing: Development of Landing Pages for tourism and leisure companies, focusing on responsive design and interactive elements to enhance user experience.
achievements.performance: Focus on performance optimization, achieving a 70% improvement in loading times through efficient use of asynchronous functions and calls.
achievements.ux: Leadership in UX innovation, creating specialized search engines for trains, hotels, and leisure, from layout to functionality, improving accessibility.
achievements.backend: Role expansion into Back-end, including API integration, PHP development and MySQL database management, demonstrating multidisciplinary skills and ability to work on large-scale projects.
